arts.ttl: Oxford beat Cardiff to give new boss Gary Rowett winning start
arts.sum: The hosts raced into a 3-0 lead before holding on to win 3-2.

arts.ttl: Oxford United 3-2 Cardiff City: Alarm bells blare out as dire run of results continues
arts.sum: The Bluebirds travelled to the Kassam Stadium in need of a win on Boxing Day but lost 3-2
Fellow substitute Callum Robinson halved the deficit in injury time, netting City's second of the afternoon resulting from a corner-kick. FINAL SCORE: OXFORD UNITED 3-2 CARDIFF CITY

arts.sum: All the build-up, action and reaction as Gary Rowett gets ready for his first game as Oxford United head coach. Rowett watched the 4-0 defeat at Leeds United from the stands. Oxford United (23rd) v Cardiff City (22nd) Comment below or tweet @OxfordMailOUFC to get involved.
